select PRJCT_SN, PRJCT_SJ, PRJCT_CN, PRJCT_BGNDE, PRJCT_ENDDE, PRJCT_ACTVTY_STTUS_CODE, PRJCT_OTHBC_AT_CODE, PRJCT_CRTR, PRJCT_CREAT_ON, (select count(*) from likeprjct where prjct_sn = project.prjct_sn) as PRJCTR_LIKE_CO, (select count(*) from bookmark_prjct where prjct_sn = project.prjct_sn) as PRJCT_SCRAP_CO, PRJCT_PHOTO, GROUP_SN, TEAM_SN, PRJCT_GITID, PRJCT_REPO from project where prjct_sn is not null and PRJCT_OTHBC_AT_CODE ='1'
order by PRJCT_SN desc

order by PRJCT_SN desc
